addPool(address).details: Called by `IncentiveVoting` after a successful token approval vote

params._tokens: Array of LP token addresses to claim for.
params._user: Address to claim rewards for. Reverts if the caller is not the claimer and the claimer has blocked third-party actions.

params._tokens: Array of token addresses to query
params._user: User to query pending rewards for

deposit(address,uint256,bool).details: Also updates the receiver's current boost

params._claimRewards: If true, also claim rewards earned on the token.

emergencyWithdraw(address).details: Should be used only in an emergency when there is an error in the reward math that prevents a normal withdrawal.

setClaimReceiver(address).details: When the claim receiver is not == address(0), all emission claims are transferred to this address

params._tokens: Array of LP tokens to update boost for
params._user: Address of the user to update boosts for

withdraw(address,uint256,bool).details: Also updates the caller's current boost

params._claimRewards: If true, also claim rewards earned on the token.

addPool(address).notice: Add a new token that may be staked within this contract

claim(address,address[]).notice: Claim pending rewards for one or more tokens for a user.

claimableReward(address,address[]).notice: Get the current number of unclaimed rewards for a user on one or more tokens

deposit(address,uint256,bool).notice: Deposit LP tokens into the contract

emergencyWithdraw(address).notice: Withdraw a user's complete deposited balance of an LP token without updating rewards calculations.

poolLength().notice: The current number of stakeable LP tokens

setBlockThirdPartyActions(bool).notice: Allow or block third-party calls to deposit, withdraw or claim rewards on behalf of the caller

setClaimReceiver(address).notice: Set the claim receiver address for the caller

updateUserBoosts(address,address[]).notice: Update a user's boost for one or more deposited tokens

withdraw(address,uint256,bool).notice: Withdraw LP tokens from the contract
